content.rendered:
Home

Custom iOS Mobile App Development Services for All Your Mobile App Needs

Having challenges finding the ideal iPhone app development company? We are here to help you with a holistic mobile app development approach.

Start today

We Build iOS App for Any Device

We’re an iPhone app development company known for crafting dynamic iOS applications & our talented iOS developers have a record of delivering award-winning apps that stand out in the App Store. Whether it’s for iPhones, iPads, Watches, or Apple TVs,  we build exceptional iOS apps for every device including IoT.

iphone

iPad

iWatch

Apple TV

iOT

Start

iOS App Development Services We Offer

We take iOS app development to the next level with a diverse range of services that meet your particular needs. Our iOS developers are your trusted collaborators in creating stunning iPhone applications that boost your company’s App Store presence.

Custom iPhone App Development

Our skilled developers use their vast experience to build custom iOS apps for organisations to solve challenging issues. Our custom iPhone app development service meets a range of company demands, from those of small startups to those of big corporations.

iOS App UX/UI Design

The secret to developing aesthetically pleasing and intuitive iOS apps that engage your audience is to employ our UX/UI Design service. We are experts at creating user-friendly interfaces that improve user experiences and lead to more user engagement and satisfaction.

iPad App Development

With our expertise in iPad app development, we can make the most of the newest iPadOS 17 to produce engaging and effective applications. Our solutions let you make use of iPad tablets' greater capabilities, resulting in smoother user experiences and higher efficiency.

Apple TV App Development

Expand your reach to the living room with interactive Apple TV apps that entertaining! Whether it's for entertainment, education, or business, we specialise in developing immersive tvOS experiences that attract audiences and drive engagement.

Apple Watch App Development

With the help of our iOS developers, you can embrace the future of Apple Watch! We take advantage of the newest watchOS 10 features to develop unique and useful apps that improve user experiences and present new opportunities for businesses, ensuring they remain competitive in the wearable technology market.

Apple App Store Help

Do you have trouble with the rules and submissions for the Apple App Store? Let us help you! Our iOS development team provides Apple App Store assistance, making sure that your app conforms with the App Store's guidelines and is easy to find among thousands of apps.

iOS App Testing

Have you got an app but don't know how it turns out? Our iOS App Testing service ensures that your application operates flawlessly, providing the high-quality experience your users deserve. We employ rigorous testing on actual devices and with real users for feedback and improvement.

Innovation at Every Step

Your compass in the complex world of app development is our iOS App Consultation service. We can help you with professional advice that assists you in navigating the iOS environment, polishing your app concepts, and developing successful business strategies.

iOS App Maintenance and Support

Our iOS team makes sure that your app receives regular updates, bug fixes, and optimisations to keep it running at its best. We're here to protect the functionality of your app, improve the level of user engagement, and offer continuing support for your changing business requirements.

iOS App Marketing

Our iOS team makes sure that your app receives regular updates, bug fixes, and optimisations to keep it running at its best. We're here to protect the functionality of your app, improve the level of user engagement, and offer continuing support for your changing business requirements.

DevOps Consulting Services

In order to maximise your DevOps journey and promote efficiency for your business, our DevOps consultants evaluate your current processes, create solutions, and suggest best practices.

Our Organized Process

We follow agile practices right from brainstorming ideas & development to post-launch support and updates. Here’s an overview of our easy process for iOS app development. 

Brainstorming & Startgezing

In the brainstorming and strategizing phase of iOS app development, we work together with you to understand your vision, target market, and unique company needs, laying the groundwork for an effective app.

UI/UX Designing

Our UI/UX designing experts craft visually stunning and intuitive user interfaces, ensuring your iOS app not only looks great but also offers a smooth and engaging user experience, setting it apart in the market

Development & Testing

Our skilled iOS developers build and thoroughly test your app during the development phase, fixing any bugs to make sure it satisfies the highest requirements of performance, security, and usefulness.

Deployment

Once your iOS app is developed, tested, and refined, our team takes it to the App Store. We take care of the technical aspects of submission, review, and approval to make sure your app is successfully launched and reaches its intended audience.

Post-Launch Support & Maintenance

We also offer post-launch support and maintenance to keep it operating without a hitch, resolving any new problems as they arise and incorporating upgrades as necessary to satisfy changing user needs.

Types of iOS Apps We Develop

We are experts in creating a wide variety of iOS apps adapted to various business types, (including B2B, B2E, and B2C), to ensure complete solutions for everyone.

Messenger

Utility

Gaming

News

Productivity

Lifestyle

Navigation

Social
Networking

Communication

Banking

Telehealth

Finance

Dating

Booking

Education

Delivery

E-commerce

Entertainment

Our Tech Stack

We have a strong and flexible tech stack for developing iOS applications to provide an effortless user interface. In order to guarantee the best speed and functionality for your app, we use a variety of tools and technologies.

Frameworks

  • SwiftUI
  • Eventkit
  • Core Bluetooth
  • SpritekitAVfoundation
  • PhoneGap
  • Cocoapod
  • SnapKit
  • React Native
  • Flutter

Library

  • Swifty Beaver
  • Eureka
  • Kingfisher
  • RxSwift
  • Spring
  • Realm
  • Alamofire
  • Snapkit

Programming Language

  • Swift
  • Objective-C

Testing

  • Appium
  • XCUITest
  • XCUITest
  • Calabash

Databases

  • SQLite
  • Realm
  • Core Data
  • Firebase

Industries We Serve

As a leading iPhone app development company, we offer specialised iOS solutions that advance businesses and successfully engage people across a broad spectrum of industries. Our expertise spans many fields, ensuring that every industry benefits from our innovative iOS applications.

Healthcare iOS

We create iOS apps that provide healthcare professionals with efficient patient management and telemedicine solutions.

Entertainment iOS App Development

Whether it’s through gaming, streaming, or interactive media experiences, our iOS apps bring entertainment to life.

Real Estate iOS App Development

We provide iOS applications that make it easier for real estate professionals to manage their properties and conduct virtual tours and property searches.

E-commerce iOS App Development

Our iOS apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Banking & Finance iOS App Development

We offer financial institutions iOS solutions that guarantee safe mobile banking and effective money management.

Travel & Hospitality iOS App Development

Our iOS applications improve the travel and hospitality sectors by providing booking tools, guest services, and travel management resources.

Healthcare iEducation iOS App DevelopmentOS

We assist educators with iOS apps for e-learning, classroom administration, and student engagement.

Manufacturing iOS App Development

We serve the manufacturing industry by improving the supply chain, automating processes, and increasing industrial efficiency.

Why choose us

We are an iPhone app development agency that combines a wealth of iOS app development expertise with a dedication to providing excellent & user-centric solutions.

Impressive UI/UX

Fast Delivery

Latest Technologies & Tools

Skilled iOS Developers

Cost-effective Services

Cross-Platform Mobile App Development

Transparent Engagement Model

Agile Methodologies

Rigorous Quality Assurance & Testing

Check out our engagement models

Learn More

Ready to boost your iOS App Development project?

Contact us

Hire Our iOS App Developers

Enhance your team’s capabilities by hiring our iOS app developers. Our skilled developers can effortlessly integrate with your ongoing projects to bring their experience in iOS development to boost productivity and hasten the development of your app. Make use of our Adaptable Engagement Models to strengthen your team and successfully deliver your iOS application development projects. 

  • Proficient in Swift and Objective-C, the core languages for iOS development.
  • Mastery of the iOS SDK, encompassing essential frameworks and tools.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills for complex app challenges.
  • Expertise in crafting user-friendly UI/UX designs for a pleasing experience.
  • Skilled in ensuring cross-device compatibility across Apple products.
  • Punctual developers with good communication skills.

Want to Explore More Options?

Check out our other mobile app development services that match your needs

Contact us

Android App Development

React Native App Development

Flutter App Development

iOS App
Development

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

FAQs

We always endeavour to give answers to the most frequently asked questions. Please do not be worried if you do not find the exact one as our professionals are always available to answer your questions. To contact us, please use the link given below.

Contact us
How much does it cost to develop an iOS application?

The cost of iOS app development can vary widely depending on factors like complexity, features, and design. For a more accurate estimate, it’s best to discuss your specific project details with us.

How long does iOS app development take?

Depending on the extent and complexity of the project, the schedule for iOS app development might range from a few weeks to several months. But, you don’t have to worry. During the project planning process, we will give you a specific timeframe.

What programming language is the best for iOS development?

Swift is the primary programming language for iOS app development, known for its efficiency and performance. Objective-C is also used for legacy projects.

Should I choose Android or iOS for mobile app development?

The choice between Android and iOS is determined by your target audience and business objectives. iOS is popular in North America and Europe, whereas Android has a wider global reach. We can help you decide based on your business objective.

What is cross-platform development?

Cross-platform development involves developing mobile apps that can run on several platforms, such as iOS and Android, using a single codebase. It can be a low-cost option to reach a larger audience. We can assist you in developing cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter and React Native.

Can I convert an Android app to iOS?

While not a straight conversion, our experienced iOS developers can assist you with creating an app for iOS, ensuring that it is available on the App Store.

Why should I choose Codevian for iOS App development?

At Codevian, we have a skilled team of iOS developers with a proven track record of delivering high-quality iOS apps. We offer tailored solutions, ensuring your app aligns with your business goals and user expectations.

Do you offer resources for iOS App development?

Absolutely! You can hire our experienced iOS developers through staff augmentation to expand your development team. We offer flexible engagement models, including full-time, part-time, or project-based options, allowing you to scale your team as needed and even outsource your entire project for efficient execution.
